records.location_details: An accident happened on board a vessel deployed to Lesvos, Greece, during maintenance activity.
records.context_note: An accident happened on 10 May in the afternoon on board of Text Removed - Justification 6 deployed to Text Removed - Justification 3 - Lesvos - involving Text Removed - Justification 4. During maintenance activity of the vessel the officer fell down and injured his leg. At the beginning it didn't appear as a serious accident. The day after (on 11 May) the officer was examined at Kalloni Medical Centre and the result of X-Ray was Tibia fissure. The officer was medicated accordingly and requested to rest until the end of deployment. (18/05/2020) Text Removed - Justification 4 was informed today. (12/05/2020).
records.evidence_quote: During maintenance activity of the vessel the officer fell down and injured his leg.

records.location_details: During patrol activity in Alexandroupolis, Greece, a crew member slid off stairs.
records.context_note: During patrol activity on 20th of February 2020 (Text Removed - Justification 2), one of the crew members, while attempting to take a towing rubber boat, slid off the stairs and injured his right leg knee. In the morning, the knee was swollen and an x-ray was taken during the hospital examination and nothing was broken, but according to the doctor, there was a possibility that the ligaments had stretched.
records.evidence_quote: one of the crew members, while attempting to take a towing rubber boat, slid off the stairs and injured his right leg knee.
